items.text: good length, not much pace, gets forward and taps it to midwicket for one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: slants across a length ball and has him all squared up as the ball beats the outside edge
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: good length around off, getsa good stride across and defends soldily
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, no run
Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: short of a length, climbs on him and leaves him with little time to react, manages to get something as he tries to shift back and keep it out
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, opens the face and steers to backward point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: short of a length. Again no pace and he is a little confused as the ball climbs and has him all squared up
items.postText: Afif Hossain, who was among the finest young players in this year's BPL, has played a starring role for Bangladesh in the Under-19 World Cup in New Zealand. The offspinning allrounder struck a fifty and then picked up a five-for against Canada as his team won their second match in a row.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: good length, holds its line outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: fullish length outside off, comes forward and tucks it away into the midwicket region
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: short of a length, angles in on leg, taps it to the left of the deep backward square leg fielder
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 2 runs

items.text: fullish length, shapes away outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: short of a length, nips away again but it's too wide to start off to make the batsman play
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: full, nips away from outside off, too wide again and Taylor shoulders arms
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: fullish, cross-seam cutter on middle and off, moves away as he defends off the outside of the bat to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: back of a length around middle, quietly keeps it out on the leg side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: good length, pitches on middle and angles away around off, defended
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: chases a wide delivery. This was coming with the dots building up. The ball jags away substantially to leave him beaten. Off-cutter again
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: that was a virtual off-break. Short of a length, just moves away considerably to leave the batsman squared up. That turned away like a conventional left-arm spin
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: oh my god! That's an unbelievable six. How has that gone for six? Seems like it would be a simple catch for a fielder inside the circle looking at the way he chipped it. Another slower ball, heaves it over but gets no timing wahatsoever. It was pretty full and inside his swinging arc. Bang off the middle of the bat. That perhaps helped him
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sikandar Raza, SIX runs
Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: good length outside off, drops it into the off side and takes off for a quick single even as cover runs forward and fires a throw at the keeper's end
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length ball, angling in towards off, shuffles across and blocks solidly

items.text: short of a length around off, punched into the covers
